comments: Adebayo (MIA) is already in Holiday's (IND) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Sabonis (IND) is moving alongside Butler's (MIA) path and the marginal contact is caused by Butler when he cuts back towards the rim.
Robinson (MIA) legally contests Sabonis' (IND) shot near the rim.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in Holiday's (IND) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Herro (MIA) brushes LeVert's (MIA) off arm as he is gathering the ball, and contact is marginal.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in Brogdon's (IND) path when contact occurs and he releases away from the contact.
Adebayo (MIA) is moving alongside Brogdon's (IND) path and maintains a legal guarding position as he defends the driving shot attempt.
LeVert (IND) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) is retreating to the side of Sabonis' (IND) body when Sabonis' momentum causes him to make marginal contact with Butler during rebounding.
LeVert (IND) establishes his left foot as his pivot foot when he receives the pass and he does not move it before the release of his dribble.
Sabonis (IND) is already in Herro's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he releases away from the contact.
Adebayo (MIA) cleanly deflects the ball away from Sabonis (IND) during rebounding.  Any ensuing contact after the deflection is considered incidental.
McConnell (IND) jumps forward into Herro's (MIA) body and delivers contact during rebounding.
McConnell (IND) initiates contact with Butler's (MIA) lower body that affects his SQBR.
Herro (MIA) is moving alongside LeVert's (IND) path and legally contests his shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Butler (MIA) and Sabonis (IND) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.

Sabonis (IND) places his hands against Iguodala's (MIA) back during the rebound but does not extend into him or otherwise dislodge him from his position.  The reaction from Iguodala is not consistent with the level of contact.
Holiday (IND) briefly grasps Robinson's (MIA) arm during his drive, and contact is marginal.
Robinson (MIA) is moving alongside Holiday's (IND) path and maintains a legal guarding position as he defends the drive.
McConnell (IND) cleanly dislodges the ball from Herro (MIA).
LeVert (IND) makes clean contact with the ball as he defends Butler (MIA) in the post.
LeVert (IND) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Adebayo (MIA) and Turner (IND) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
Herro (MIA) brushes LeVert's (IND) off arm as he is passing the ball, and contact is marginal.
Brogdon (IND) brings his arm down and makes contact with Adebayo (MIA) that affects his shot near the rim.
Herro (MIA) is moving alongside LeVert's (IND) path and maintains a legal guarding position as he defends the drive.
LeVert (IND) is bracing for the contact from Herro (MIA) and releases away from the contact.
Holiday (IND) places his hand momentarily on Robinson's (MIA) hip before he immediately removes his hand.
LeVert (IND) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Ariza (MIA) and McConnell (IND) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
McConnell (IND) is already in Ariza's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Ariza (MIA) is moving alongside LeVert's (IND) path and maintains a legal guarding position on the perimeter.
Ariza (MIA) legally contests LeVert's (IND) jump shot attempt.
Miami attempts to call a timeout when they gain possession of the ball, which is not observed by the referee crew during transition.
Brogdon (IND) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
